v2.about:
5+ Years | 30+ Products | $35M+ Combined Valuation

I don’t just write code, I build systems that ship fast, scale hard, and actually work in production.

Let’s Talk Builds

-Scaled web apps that handle 1M+ monthly users without blinking.
-Built internal tools that cut ops time by 40%.
-Launched MVPs in under 30 days for SaaS, eComm, and B2B startups.
-Engineered secure auth systems with 2FA, SSO, and role-based access.
-Built full analytics dashboards that track everything from user behavior to churn.
-Integrated AI features from GPT-powered assistants to real-time ML predictions.

At my core, I help startups go from "idea on a napkin" to a stable, scalable product.

Let’s Get Technical

React, Next.js, TypeScript on the front.
Node.js, Express, and Django on the back.
PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Firebase in the middle.
AWS, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines to keep everything running smooth.

Not afraid of DevOps. Not scared of legacy code. Always up for a challenge.

Why Me?

Because I get it.
Startups don’t need 200-page specs. They need velocity, adaptability, and someone who knows how to prioritize what matters. I’ve worked side-by-side with 20+ founders, built the v1s, cleaned up the v0s, and scaled the stuff that took off.

If you're a founder who wants to ship smarter, scale faster, and not spend a fortune doing it, let’s build.
v2.headline: Built & Scaled 30+ Projects | Delivered 120+ Features | Full-Stack Dev Turning MVPs into Revenue
